items.name: button
items.title: win98 button
items.docs:
This button component is designed with the MS Sans Serif font (via --font-sans CSS variable) and specific Win98 style shadows. Please ensure:
1. You have MS Sans Serif font files and configured them in your project (e.g., via next/font/local and global CSS) to set the '--font-ms-sans-serif' variable, and that your '--font-sans' variable uses it.
2. The following shadow utilities are defined in your tailwind.config.ts: 'win98-default' and 'win98-active'. Refer to 98.ui documentation for exact definitions.
